verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: because his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let Yisra'EL <WH3478> now say <WH559> <WH8799>, that his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let the house <WH1004> of Aharon <WH175> now say <WH559> <WH8799>, that his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let them now that fear <WH3373> the YY <WH3068> say <WH559> <WH8799>, that his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
I called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon the YY <WH3050> in distress <WH4712>: the YY <WH3050> answered <WH6030> <WH8804> me, and set me in a large place <WH4800>.
The YY <WH3068> is on my side; I will not fear <WH3372> <WH8799>: what can <WH6213> man <WH120> do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto me?
The YY <WH3068> taketh my part with them that help <WH5826> <WH8802> me: therefore shall I see <WH7200> <WH8799> my desire upon them that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> <WH8800> in the YY <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> <WH8800> in man <WH120>.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> <WH8800> in the YY <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> <WH8800> in princes <WH5081>.
All nations <WH1471> compassed me about <WH5437> <WH8804>: but in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> will I destroy <WH4135> <WH8686> them.
They compassed me about <WH5437> <WH8804>; yea, they compassed me about <WH5437> <WH8804>: but in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> I will destroy <WH4135> <WH8686> them.

They compassed me about <WH5437> <WH8804> like bees <WH1682>; they are quenched <WH1846> <WH8795> as the fire <WH784> of tshofars <WH6975>: for in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> I will destroy <WH4135> <WH8686> them.
Thou hast thrust <WH1760> <WH8804> sore <WH1760> <WH8800> at me that I might fall <WH5307> <WH8800>: but the YY <WH3068> helped <WH5826> <WH8804> me.
The YY <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>, and is become my salvation <WH3444>.

The voice <WH6963> of rejoicing <WH7440> and salvation <WH3444> is in the tabernacles <WH168> of the righteous <WH6662>: the right hand <WH3225> of the YY <WH3068> doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> valiantly <WH2428>.
The right hand <WH3225> of the YY <WH3068> is exalted <WH7426> <WH8802>: the right hand <WH3225> of the YY <WH3068> doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> valiantly <WH2428>.
I shall not die <WH4191> <WH8799>, but live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and declare <WH5608> <WH8762> the works <WH4639> of the YY <WH3050>.
The YY <WH3050> hath chastened <WH3256> <WH8765> me sore <WH3256> <WH8763>: but he hath not given me over <WH5414> <WH8804> unto death <WH4194>.
Open <WH6605> <WH8798> to me the gates <WH8179> of righteousness <WH6664>: I will go <WH935> <WH8799> into them, and I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3050>:
This gate <WH8179> of the YY <WH3068>, into which the righteous <WH6662> shall enter <WH935> <WH8799>.
I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee: for thou hast heard <WH6030> <WH8804> me, and art become my salvation <WH3444>.
The stone <WH68> which the builders <WH1129> <WH8802> refused <WH3988> <WH8804> is become the head <WH7218> stone of the corner <WH6438>.
This is the YY'S <WH3068> doing; it is marvellous <WH6381> <WH8738> in our eyes <WH5869>.
This is the day <WH3117> which the YY <WH3068> hath made <WH6213> <WH8804>; we will rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> and be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> in it.
Save <WH3467> <WH8685> now, I beseech <WH577> thee, O YY <WH3068>: O YY <WH3068>, I beseech <WH577> thee, send now prosperity <WH6743> <WH8685>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be he that cometh <WH935> <WH8802> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>: we have blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> you out of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

'Elohim <WH410> is the YY <WH3068>, which hath shewed us light <WH215> <WH8686>: bind <WH631> <WH8798> the sacrifice <WH2282> with cords <WH5688>, even unto the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196>.
Thou art my 'Elohim <WH410>, and I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee: thou art my 'Elohim <WH430>, I will exalt <WH7311> <WH8787> thee.
O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
